data.text: Ariel, Ariel,
To kata kamano abiro monjo Ariel
Abiro lwori koni gi koni,
Nadwoki piny miwuo mana koa ei lowo;
To jowasiki mangʼeny nochal gi buru mayom,
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego nobi gi mor polo
Eka ogendini mag pinje duto makedo gi Ariel,
mana ka ngʼama kech kayo to leko ni chiemo,
Bed mobuok kendo kiwuoro,
Jehova Nyasaye osekelo nindo matut kuomu,

Un to fwenyruokni duto nochalnu mana ka gima nono, mana ka kitabu modin gi duogo. To ka imiyo ngʼato manyalo somo, miwachone niya, “Yie isom kitabuni,” to obiro dwoko niya, “Ok anyal some nikech odine gi duogo.”
Kata ka imiyo ngʼat makia somo miwachone niya, “Yie isomna kitabuni,” to obiro dwoko niya, “Ok angʼeyo somo.”
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya:
Kuom mano anachak abwog chuny jogi
Ginine malit jogo maparo timo gimoro amora
Iloko gik moko ataro,
Kuom ndalo matin kende, donge Lebanon nolok mana ka puodho momewo
E kindeno joma itgi odino nowinj
Joma obolore nochak obed gi mor kuom Jehova Nyasaye;
Joma timbegi mono nolal nono,
gin jogo machiwo neno mar miriambo
Kuom mano ma e wach ma Jehova Nyasaye, mane oreso Ibrahim wachone od Jakobo ni,
Ka gineno nyithindgi ma tich lweta e kindgi,
Joma parogi bayo noyud rieko;
